new_app.description: Generates a Spree project with storefront and backend modules.

input.samples: Do you want to load the samples?

message.skipping: Skipping process of generating the "{{ name }}"...

message.configure: Visit {{ documentationURL }} to learn how to configure the "{{ name }}".

message.dependency_not_found: Could not find "{{ name }}" on your machine. Please install it before running Spree CLI
message.dependency_version_mismatch: The configuration you chose requires "{{ name }}" "{{ expectedVersion }}", while version "{{ currentVersion }}" is currently installed. Please install the correct version before running Spree CLI

start_app.description: Starts up an already generated project.
